SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
Default entry point class
AvailableTowerManager
Static class to hold all available towers for placement, either from the start screen or from the shop.
Cart
Manages statistics and resources for in-game Carts.
FXWindow
Class starts the javaFX application window
FXWrapper
Wrapper for each FXML scene loaded by the game.
GameOverManager
Handles win and lose screens at the end of the game, and resetting the game if the player requests another round.
GoldManager
Class to manage a static gold balance between controllers.
HomeScreenController
FXML controller for the home screen.
MainGameController
Game and Shop FXML controllers.
PlayerManager
Static method to store the player name, difficulty and number of rounds as set by the player during setup.
Round
Manages each round of the game, including speed and difficulty.
RoundManager
Manages game rounds and checks for win / loss conditions.
SetupScreenController
FXML Controller for the setup screen stage.
Tile
Stores information about tiles placed on the board.
Tower
Model to store statistics and other details about towers.
TowerScreenController
Controls the initial tower loadout selection screen.
WindowManager
Used to control movement between game screens using the same JavaFX window.
